text.value:
INSERT INTO sapsr3.ymsdt_order_item (
    mandt,
    order_request_no,
    order_item,
    contr_no,
    contr_item_no,
    matnr,
    kwmeng,
    meins,
    conv_ratio,
    hg_item_no,
    ind_item_no,
    werks,
    reqd_del_date,
    prod_grp,
    conf_del_date,
    nds_dtl_no,
    no_pieces,
    theo_weight_kg,
    product_type,
    product_marking,
    group_marking,
    st_element_type,
    bbs_no,
    bbs_desc,
    wbs1,
    wbs2,
    wbs3,
    wbs4,
    wbs5,
    shape_code,
    invoice_length,
    ext_dimension_l,
    ext_dimension_w,
    ext_dimension_h,
    vehi_type,
    nds_sale_order,
    sales_order,
    status,
    inter_id,
    timestamp,
    error_cd,
    proc_ts,
    rec_type,
    userid,
    udate,
    utime,
    net_wt,
    gross_wt,
    uom_net,
    uom_gross,
    pstyv,
    no_variant,
    no_item,
    clbd_item,
    z_shape_surcharg,
    z_no_of_cut_pc,
    z_no_of_bend_pc,
    z_no_rolling,
    z_cou_type_1,
    z_cou_type_2,
    z_pieces,
    ref_ord_itm_no,
    status_dss,
    act_wt_per_pc,
    identical_hcode,
    similar_mb_hcode,
    similar_el_hcode
) SELECT
    mandt,
    order_request_no,
    order_item,
    contr_no,
    contr_item_no,
    matnr,
    kwmeng,
    meins,
    conv_ratio,
    hg_item_no,
    ind_item_no,
    werks,
    reqd_del_date,
    prod_grp,
    conf_del_date,
    nds_dtl_no,
    no_pieces,
    theo_weight_kg,
    product_type,
    product_marking,
    group_marking,
    st_element_type,
    bbs_no,
    bbs_desc,
    wbs1,
    wbs2,
    wbs3,
    wbs4,
    wbs5,
    shape_code,
    invoice_length,
    ext_dimension_l,
    ext_dimension_w,
    ext_dimension_h,
    vehi_type,
    nds_sale_order,
    sales_order,
    status,
    inter_id,
    timestamp,
    error_cd,
    proc_ts,
    rec_type,
    userid,
    udate,
    utime,
    net_wt,
    gross_wt,
    uom_net,
    uom_gross,
    pstyv,
    no_variant,
    no_item,
    clbd_item,
    z_shape_surcharg,
    z_no_of_cut_pc,
    z_no_of_bend_pc,
    z_no_rolling,
    z_cou_type_1,
    z_cou_type_2,
    z_pieces,
    ref_ord_itm_no,
    status_dss,
    act_wt_per_pc,
    identical_hcode,
    similar_mb_hcode,
    similar_el_hcode
FROM sapsr3.esb_ymsdt_order_item
where (order_request_no,  order_item) in 
(Select order_request_no,  order_item 
FROM sapsr3.esb_ymsdt_order_item 
minus 
Select order_request_no,  order_item 
FROM sapsr3.ymsdt_order_item) and order_request_no = '@{pipeline().parameters.ORDER_REQUEST_NUMBER}';
